description: Clustal W. Tool for multiple alignment of nucleic acid and protein sequences. Developed by University College Dublin (command-line version)
notes: You are installing the command-line version. For command-line version, install 'clustalx'.
Clustal W is not being maintained anymore. For latest features and fixes, we recommend installing 'Clustal Omega'
To install it, run: scoop install clustal-omega
